name: GroConnect
0:
”Alexa, turn on backyard sprinklers”
”Alexa, turn off garden sprinklers”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: With the Gro Smart Watering Controller smart home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Gro device by voice. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Gro account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).
